header.title: Welcome to Our E-Banking Platform
header.subTitle: Experience seamless and secure online banking services at your fingertips. Manage your finances conveniently from anywhere, anytime.

part1.subTitle: We’re building the best way to move and manage the world’s money. Min fees. Max ease. Full speed.

part2.title: Effortless Money Transactions Anytime
part2.subTitle: FlowPay simplifies online money transactions with speed, security, and convenience. Whether you’re managing bills, transferring funds, or tracking payments, FlowPay ensures a seamless and user-friendly experience across all devices.

partenaire.title: Pay your bill online without leaving home and in a secure manner
partenaire.subTitle: Quick, easy, and safe payments from the comfort of your home.

agentfeatures.title: Open Your Account with Our Agent: Simple and Fast
agentfeatures.subTitle: Our agent will guide you through the entire account creation process, ensuring a smooth and efficient experience. Whether you’re at home or on the go, you can easily provide the necessary documents and complete the process without visiting a bank branch.

enterYourEmailToResetPassword.title: Enter your Email to Reset Password

consultAccount.title: Consultation of client accounts and management of virtual cards
consultAccount.search: Search by Email-Address or Phone nunber

section1.title: What is FlowPay ?
section1.desc: FlowPay is an e-banking application that allows you to manage your personal finances, make payments, and securely view your transactions.

section2.title: Who can use FlowPay?
section2.desc: Anyone with a bank account at partner banks.

section3.title: Is FlowPay available in multiple languages?
section3.desc: Yes, FlowPay supports multiple languages, including French, English.

section4.title: Is FlowPay secure ?
section4.desc: Absolutely. FlowPay uses advanced encryption protocols (SSL/TLS) and two-factor authentication (2FA) to ensure your data is safe.

section5.title: How do I create an account on FlowPay?
section5.desc: Check our Platform, register with your email address, and link your bank accounts by following the guided steps.
